title: Hour 2: Caring About The Cowboys
description:
The Useless Sound Montage leads us to NFL talk including why Stugotz is convinced the Bucs will win it all and why Billy believes Tom Brady can have a comeback not just on the field, but in his marriage. Then, with basketball season beginning, Amin talks John Wall, bad defense, and more. Plus, Stephen A.'s Top 5 begs a question from Dan: Why do we still care about the Dallas Cowboys?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
